Posts.Content: I am a woman of 61, over menapause and have taken femara for 4 years,,,,, 1 year and 6 months to go says my oncol.  I suffered the same side effects and still act over 100 when I get up in the morning but try to overlook this.  I exercise a lot and drink lots of water which I think helps, (could be mind control)....
Posts.Title: sexual discomfort
